posts.body: Hi, fren. I think we can start by convincing all of the shitposters on fedivers to use this board. I mean, if they already use decentralized social media and chats, they might be interested in decentralized 4chins.

>>3624f1ef-838f-484a-9c95-ccc2c0951e8e
If you want to learn more about fediverse, you can start from here: 
https://glowers.club/wiki/doku.php?id=wiki:newfriends
 As you can see, we have already started colonizing the decentro-lands.
